Agency: Transportation Department Aviation Consumer Protection Division

Description: Tokyo-based Japan Airlines International Co. Ltd. agreed to plead guilty and pay a $110 million criminal fine for its role in a conspiracy to fix rates for international cargo shipments.

Agency: Transportation Department Aviation Consumer Protection Division
